resources.string: This app allows you to measure the quality of the mobile network signal, the WiFi signal and the acoustic noise in your area. The measurements are displayed on a map and can be used to identify areas with poor signal or noise pollution. The app can be used in two ways: Manual: the measurements are run manually by the user. Automatic: the measurements are run automatically in the background. The app is divided in three sections: Main, Settings and App Manual. The Main section is divided into four views among which you can navigate with the bottom navigation bar: Home: the landing view of the app. Contains a menu to go to the other pages of the app. Mobile: this view contains a map with the measurements of the mobile network signal strength. WiFi: this view contains a map with the measurements of the WiFi signal strength. Noise: this view contains a map with the measurements of the acoustic noise. The other two section are accessible from the Home menu: Settings: this section allows you to manage settings for the app\'s features. App Manual: this current section. It contains the manual of the app. NOTE: the app requires the location and microphone permission to run.
